name: The lost child (itch) (shikrar)
description:
As the view began to twist, the child saw nothing but the endless blue forest. The child who had run away from home after arguing with his family was looking around and saw the glowing little mouse. 

It's not exactly an animal, it shines, it has a long, thin tail and a small light bulb like a lantern fish. It spoke to the child. The child knows if he wants to go back, he must stop the ghost's mischief, search for all the keys, and return them to the forest. So the child's journey began…

WASD or Arrow can move. J key for shooting. Each shot damages 1. Each enemy has 3 HP.

Key features: Maze, casual

Release day:10 June, 2020

Platform: Itch.io

Price: Free

Contact information: tsurufish@gmail.com

[Fish. A person who likes to play games.]
